argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | addlsub.a | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | addlsub.b | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | addlsub.c | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_addcomd | |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) = ( B + A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = C <-> ( B + A ) = C ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 1, 3 | #P_addlsub | |- ( ph -> ( ( B + A ) = C <-> B = ( C - A ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = C <-> B = ( C - A ) ) ) |
